#program day03  10 RUN AT 3  20 LAYER 2,1  30 PAPER 182: INK 0: CLS   40 LAYER PALETTE 0,48, BIN 011000000  50 LAYER PALETTE 0,49, BIN 111111000  60 LAYER PALETTE 0,50, BIN 101101101  70 PRINT PAPER 0; INK 255;"AoC 2021.03 Binary Diag         "  80 FOR n=0 TO 7  90 INK 224: PLOT 208+n,7-n: DRAW 7,0: INK 252: DRAW 8,0: INK 28: DRAW 8,0: INK 31: DRAW 8,0: INK 0 100 NEXT n 110 PRINT AT 3,1;"Epsilon"; AT 5,1;"Gamma"; AT 7,1;"Oxygen"; AT 9,1;"Carbon"; 120 INK 0 130 FOR i=3 TO 9 STEP 2 140 PRINT AT i,11; PAPER 255; INK 0;"            "; AT i,26;"0    "; 150 PLOT 11*8-1,i*8-1: DRAW 97,0: DRAW 0,9: DRAW -97,0: DRAW 0,-8 160 PLOT 26*8-1,8*i-1: DRAW 41,0: DRAW 0,9: DRAW -41,0: DRAW 0,-8 170 NEXT i 180 PRINT AT 12,1; PAPER 0; INK 255;"Power rating  "; AT 12,17;"Life support  "; 190 PLOT 7,12*8: DRAW 0,16: DRAW 113,0: DRAW 0,-16 200 PLOT 135,12*8: DRAW 0,16: DRAW 113,0: DRAW 0,-16 210 PRINT AT 13,1; PAPER 255; INK 0;"              "; AT 13,17;"              "; 220 : 230 REM ††††††††††††††††††††††† 240 : 250 DIM a$(1000,12): DIM a(1000) 260 READ count 270 FOR i=1 TO count 280 READ a$(i): LET a(i)=i 290 NEXT i 300 : 310 REM ††††††††††††††††††††††† 320 : 330 LET cache=0 340 PROC Paint() 350 LET e$="": LET g$="" 360 FOR i=1 TO 12 370 PROC Winner(i,1000) TO w: LET w$="01"(w+1) 380 LET e$=e$+w$: LET g$=g$+ CHR$ (97- CODE w$) 390 PRINT AT 3,11; PAPER 255; INK 0;e$; AT 5,11;g$; 400 FOR j=0 TO 16: PLOT INK 182;j*16+i-1,128: DRAW INK 182;0,64: NEXT j 410 NEXT i 420 LET epsilon= VAL ( CHR$ (196) + e$): LET gamma= VAL ( CHR$ (196)+g$) 430 PRINT AT 3,26; PAPER 255; INK 0;epsilon; AT 5,26;gamma; 440 PRINT AT 13,1; PAPER 255; INK 0;epsilon*gamma; 450 :  460 REM ††††††††††††††††††††††† 470 : 480 LAYER PALETTE 0,48, BIN 000011000 490 PROC Paint() 500 PROC Filter("01") TO o$ 510 LET oxygen= VAL ( CHR$ (196)+o$) 520 PRINT AT 7,11; PAPER 255; INK 0;o$; AT 7,26;oxygen; 530 FOR n=1 TO 1000: LET a(n)=n: NEXT n 540 LAYER PALETTE 0,48, BIN 000000011 550 PROC Paint() 560 PROC Filter("10") TO c$ 570 LET carbon= VAL ( CHR$ (196)+c$) 580 PRINT AT 9,11; PAPER 255; INK 0;c$; AT 9,26; carbon; 590 PRINT AT 13,17; PAPER 255; INK 0;oxygen*carbon 600 PRINT AT 23,0; 610 STOP  620 : 630 REM ††††††††††††††††††††††† 640 : 650 DEFPROC Filter(v$) 660 LOCAL n,bit,size,w,low,high 670 LET bit=1: LET size=count 680 IF size=1 THEN GO TO %800 690 PROC Winner(bit,size) TO w 700 LET w$=v$(1+w) 710 LET low=1 720 LET high=1 730 IF a$(a(high),bit)<>w$ THEN BANK 11 POKE a(high)*16-16,"222222222222": LET high=high+1: GO TO %760 740 IF low<>high THEN LET a(low)=a(high): LET low=low+1: LET high=high+1: GO TO %760 750 LET low=low+1: LET high=high+1 760 IF high<=size THEN GO TO %730 770 LET bit=bit+1 780 LET size=low-1 790 GO TO %680 800 ENDPROC =a$(a(1)) 810 STOP  820 : 830 REM ††††††††††††††††††††††† 840 : 850 DEFPROC Winner(bit,size) 860 LOCAL o,j 870 IF bit=1 AND cache<>0 THEN LET o=cache: GO TO %930 880 LET o=0 890 FOR j=1 TO size 900 IF a$(a(j),bit)="1" THEN LET o=o+1 910 NEXT j 920 IF bit=1 THEN LET cache=o 930 IF o>=size/2 THEN ENDPROC =1 940 ENDPROC =0 950 : 960 REM ††††††††††††††††††††††† 970 : 980 DEFPROC Paint() 990 LOCAL n1000 FOR n=1 TO 10001010 BANK 11 POKE n*16-16,a$(n)1020 NEXT n1030 ENDPROC 1040 :1050 REM †††††††††††††††††††††††1060 :1070 DATA 10001080 DATA "011010010110", "101110100110", "011011011110", "100011010001", "011011100111"1090 DATA "011000100101", "101101011001", "010001001001", "100010110111", "001110110101"1100 DATA "100111011001", "100110111011", "000000111101", "000000011101", "011101000011"1110 DATA "101101001111", "110101011101", "010100000100", "100111010001", "111110001000"1120 DATA "000110110110", "101000010000", "101010000111", "000100100101"1150 DATA "111111111101", "000100101010", "101000101000", "101010010111", "111011000010"1160 DATA "100101010110", "010011000101", "010010111011",
